putting sound waves to your vision



Nice to meet you!

I'm Manny Marx. I like to make music. What I really like to do is make music with people. Whether it be collaborating musically or crafting the sounds which are in someones head, I really enjoy it. In fact, I'd say I'm pretty good at it. But hey, don't take my word for it, too. Check out what people have to say about it and what we created.

Check it out

What I make sounds for

*but not limited to

Music Production

Form a lullaby to an action packed chase to an ominous forest in the depths of a kingdom lost to Darkness.

I'll write it.

Sound Design

clicks, presses, swipes, footsteps, busy streets, an intergalactic being from depths of the crab nebula.

I'll make it.

Collaboration

We can work together in song writing, remixing, beats, and sampling. I can be session musician or voice actor. I got you.

Entertainment Media

I have spent copious amounts of time participating in all forms of media from social networking services to video games.

If there is a sound to be made,

I'll craft it

How the process all goes down

For our first meeting via a method of your choice (e.g. E-mail, Skype, G-Chat, face to face, etc.) we will discuss your project and the sounds you are looking for. If possible you will provide me with examples to aid me in creating the sounds you need. Soon after I will provide you with a demo of my work
FOR FREEEE.
